about_the_game:
Gacha Party is a tower defense game.


One day, an electronic virus spread among the robots, and the tiny robots originally used for housekeeping services awakened! They no longer serve humans, but regard destruction as their ultimate goal~

"Magic must be defeated by magic"
A new generation of beautiful girl dolls was born! Let's duel with microcomputers everywhere!

In Gacha Party you can experience,

★Lovely character image design, battle features adapted to local conditions (⊙ꇴ⊙)

Small people + big props, see how the characters arm themselves with everyday items!
Each character has a unique combat weapon - a biscuit, a keyboard, or an old CD!

★Super casual tower defense gameplay ᕕ(ᐛ)ᕗ
Experience the classic tower defense gameplay.
Levels of different difficulty can be switched freely to see who can fight to the end.

★Theme scenes of various styles (ꈍ﹃ ꈍ)

Cozy cottage, Chinese-style tea table, free to experience various theme scenes!
Fight bravely on Cakes, Dreams, Desktop, Refrigerators, and even Ovens to protect your homeland!

★Workshop built-in! Everyone is a creator (≥▽≤)

We have a built-in workshop in the game, all game modes can be freely edited, uploaded and shared!
Let everyone see who is the most creative!

One day, an electronic virus spread among the robots, and the tiny robots originally used for housekeeping services awakened! They no longer serve humans, but regard destruction as their ultimate goal~

"Magic must be defeated by magic"
A new generation of beautiful girl dolls was born! Let's duel with microcomputers everywhere!

name: Gacha Party

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i5 - 2.4G Hz
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 430 / ATI Radeon HD 2600XT
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 - 2.4G Hz
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 430 / ATI Radeon HD 2600XT
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Welcome to Gacha Party! Gacha Party is a tower defense game with a built-in creative workshop for free map editing. This is a lovely world with cute characters and exquisite scenes.
